mapper.select: SELECT meet_no, meet_poster, meet_charge, meet_cg, meet_total, meet_limit, TO_CHAR(to_date(meet_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),'YY-MM-DD') as meet_start, TO_CHAR(to_date(meet_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),'YY-MM-DD') as meet_end, meet_subject, meet_like, num FROM (SELECT meet_no, meet_poster, meet_charge, meet_cg, meet_total, meet_limit, meet_start, meet_end, meet_subject, meet_like, rownum as num FROM (SELECT meet_no, meet_poster, meet_charge, meet_cg, meet_total, meet_limit, meet_start, meet_end, meet_subject, meet_like FROM meeting ORDER BY meet_no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT m.meet_no,m.meet_cg,m.meet_poster,o.om_name,o.om_id,o.om_tel,o.om_company,m.meet_subject,TO_CHAR(to_date(m.meet_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일" HH24"시"MI"분"') as meet_start, TO_CHAR(to_date(m.meet_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'),'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일" HH24"시"MI"분"') as meet_end, m.meet_loc, m.meet_total, m.meet_limit, m.meet_info, m.meet_price, m.meet_like, m.meet_hit, m.meet_detail, m.meet_lat, m.meet_lng FROM meeting m , oim_member o WHERE o.om_id=m.om_id AND m.meet_no=#{meet_no}
SELECT om_id, om_tel FROM oim_member WHERE om_id=#{om_id}
